solution_line_template: He consumes {calories_per_day}*{non_saturday_days}+{saturday_calories}=<<{calories_per_day}*{non_saturday_days}+{saturday_calories}={total_weekly_calories}>>{total_weekly_calories} calories in the week.
He burns {calories_burned_per_day}*{days_in_week}=<<{calories_burned_per_day}*{days_in_week}={total_weekly_burned}>>{total_weekly_burned} calories in the week
His caloric deficit is {total_weekly_burned}-{total_weekly_calories}=<<{total_weekly_burned}-{total_weekly_calories}={caloric_deficit}>>{caloric_deficit} calories per week
